encounters.name: Storms and Turbulence
encounters.description: You encounter a sudden thunderstorm with heavy turbulence.

success.description: You manage to navigate through the storm, but the rough weather delays your delivery slightly.

failure.description: The turbulence causes damage to your cargo and delays your delivery significantly. Repair costs are incurred.

success.description: You avoid the storm entirely, but it adds some extra time to your route.

failure.description: A miscalculation in your new route adds a significant delay and increases fuel consumption.

reaction_options.option: Land and wait for the storm to pass

success.description: You safely land at a nearby airstrip and wait for the storm to pass, though you lose time waiting.

encounters.name: Icing Conditions
encounters.description: Ice starts forming on your wings, affecting the plane's performance.

success.description: The de-icing system works perfectly, and the ice melts away.

failure.description: The de-icing system malfunctions, and you lose engine power temporarily, causing a rough landing.

success.description: You successfully descend into warmer air, melting the ice.

failure.description: The ice worsens during the descent, and you are forced to make an emergency landing.

reaction_options.option: Continue flying and hope the ice melts

success.description: The ice melts on its own, and the flight continues normally.

failure.description: The ice buildup becomes critical, and you lose control of the plane, leading to a crash landing.

encounters.name: Fuel Shortage
encounters.description: You realize mid-flight that your fuel is running dangerously low due to a leak.

success.description: You safely land at a nearby airport and refuel, avoiding disaster.

failure.description: Unexpected traffic at the airport delays your landing, and the fuel runs out mid-approach, forcing an emergency landing.

success.description: You successfully conserve enough fuel to make it to your destination.

failure.description: Despite conserving fuel, you still run out and have to make a forced landing in a nearby field.

reaction_options.option: Push through to destination at normal speed

success.description: You barely make it to your destination as the fuel runs out just after landing.

failure.description: You run out of fuel mid-flight and have to make an emergency landing in a remote area.

encounters.name: Engine Malfunction
encounters.description: One of your engines starts malfunctioning mid-flight.

reaction_options.option: Shut down the malfunctioning engine and continue with the other

success.description: You successfully fly with one engine and make it to the nearest airport safely.

failure.description: Flying on one engine causes additional strain, and the second engine fails. You have to perform an emergency landing.

success.description: The in-flight repair works, and the engine is restored to full functionality.

failure.description: The repair fails, worsening the malfunction and forcing you to shut down the engine.

reaction_options.option: Land immediately for a full repair

success.description: You land safely at the nearest airfield and get the engine repaired, though it takes extra time.

encounters.name: Crowded Airspace
encounters.description: Approaching your destination, you find the airspace is highly congested with air traffic.

success.description: You safely wait your turn to land, though it causes a delay in your delivery time.

reaction_options.option: Request priority landing from air traffic control

success.description: Your request is granted, and you make a swift landing, avoiding delays.

failure.description: Air traffic control denies your request, forcing you into a holding pattern anyway.

success.description: You divert to a nearby, less crowded airport, but youâ€™ll have to make alternate delivery arrangements.

failure.description: The nearby airport is also crowded, causing even further delays.
